arts.ttl: Athletic Bilbao wins 1-0 at Sevilla to solidify its fourth place in Spanish league
arts.sum: Athletic Bilbao solidified its fourth place in the Spanish league with a 1-0 win at Sevilla on Sunday. It was the third straight victory for Betis in all competitions, and the second loss in a row for 18th-placed Leganes.

arts.ttl: Athletic Bilbao targeting reunion with former youth player now at Championship side?
arts.sum: Athletic Bilbao are allegedly contemplating whether to make an approach for a top-performing Championship attacker who has previously represented their youth team.

arts.ttl: Arsenal's Nico Williams 'advantage' revealed as Gunners 'enter talks' with Athletic Bilbao attacker
arts.sum: Arsenal reportedly enter discussions with Nico Williams's camp over a summer deal for the Athletic Bilbao attacker, who is also wanted by Barcelona and Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club star left out of squad for Sevilla clash
arts.sum: A leading member of the defensive ranks at La Liga outfit Athletic Club has been left out of the club’s squad for their upcoming meeting with Sevilla. The player in…

arts.ttl: Arsenal 'open talks with Nico Williams' camp' over summer transfer - but face strong competition from European heavyweights
arts.sum: Arsenal have reportedly made contact with Athletic Bilbao star Nico Williams' representatives over a potential transfer in what could be one of the coups of the summer.

arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Nico Williams alternative identified as Gunners 'in six-team battle' for £42.2m winger
arts.sum: Arsenal and Liverpool are reportedly among the clubs chasing the signature of Lyon attacker Malick Fofana, who has been the subject of 'positive scouting reports'.

arts.ttl: Bilbao mayor plots increased security for Rangers arrival after Athletic fan riots spark police major warning
arts.sum: Barry Ferguson and Co travel to the Basque region of Spain next month for their Europa League last eight clash

Sevilla are on an impressive run of form in La Liga, losing just once in their previous nine games. Their only defeat during that time saw them suffer a 4-1 loss against league-leaders Barcelona. Ath...

arts.ttl: Preview: Sevilla vs. Athletic Bilbao - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's La Liga clash between Sevilla and Athletic Bilbao, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club star rewarded for form with international recall
arts.sum: A leading member of the attacking ranks at La Liga outfit Athletic Club has been afforded a return to international duty with his home nation. The player in question? Iñaki…
